name: Rethoric
all_locations: San Diego, CA, USA; Mexico City, CDMX, Mexico; Remote
long_description:
At Rethoric, we manage founder-led content marketing strategies on LinkedIn and newsletters for busy founders to amplify their brand awareness and lead generation at scale.

By joining biweekly (twice a month) interview sessions. We help founders reflect on their meetings, conversations, experiences, lessons, and stories. 

We then use these to post eye-catching, thought-provoking content. This content positions them as thought leaders and industry authorities. The end goal is to drive attention from their ICP to generate leads, build credibility, and get customers at scale on autopilot.
one_liner: We create next-level founder-led content strategies for busy founders
